lead_paragraph: Yolanda Griffith scored 17 points and the Sacramento Monarchs advanced to the Western Conference finals with a 92-64 victory over the visiting Houston Comets in Game 2 of their first-round W.N.B.A. playoff series. It was the final game for the Comets’ Dawn Staley, the veteran point guard who announced her retirement earlier in the year.
